name: Popstars
overview: Become popstar has never been so easy! Take the microphone in your hand and charm the jury with your voice, so they can not help but choose you in the new band. In over 30 pop songs, it is necessary to show stunning performances! Create your own style! Create your age-ego according to your ideas and steal your competition with the show! Meet on your way to the Popstar from Popstars-Casting and the Recall, through the workshops to the grand finale on varied and atmospheric locations. Feel the exhausting nerve kitzel on your own body, if the critical jury judges about success or failure!
